lyric.verse: Soo minakereba kore ga genjitsu Kyookasho wo ushinatta Teiuka suteta Soo deokureta Wakaranai shizentai no huri Ai no koto kiboo no koto ikimono no koto Aa SWITCH ON LEVEL 30 (san-juu) akite kita Sore demo CLEAR shinakya Soo modotte takai sora nagametara Aosugite aosugite Chihedode someta Aa SAVE shimasu ka Shimashita kokoro no naka de Ima nan-ji daroo nani jidai daroo Nemurenai n daroo Aa SWITCH ON Shookan-suru ka DOOR wo akeru ka kaifuku-suru ka zenmetsu-suru ka Shookan-suru ka DOOR wo akeru ka kaifuku-suru ka zenmetsu-suru ka Shookan-suru ka DOOR wo akeru ka kaifuku-suru ka zenmetsu-suru ka Shookan-suru ka DOOR wo akeru ka kaifuku-suru ka zenmetsu-suru ka Kakikaesuru ka
